name: Colored serafuku
description:
>>Donate Coffee for Gtonero<<

Colored working

  • beige,black,blue,brown,green,grey,orange,pink,purple,red,white,yellow

  • Not sure all colors neckerchief work.

Training Data v.1.0

  • 570 image 8 repeats 1 epochs

  • Powershell ISE run script kohya-ss

  • module = Networks.LoRA

  • polynomial 0.7

  • 16 DIM / 16 Alpha

  • U-net 1e-4

  • Loss 0.103

meta.prompt: (yellow serafuku:1.4), 1girl, solo, standing, (neckerchief:1.1), white hair, purple eyes, short sleeves, pleated skirt, (yellow skirt:1.2), long skirt, indoors, very long hair, halo,
meta.negativePrompt: (worst quality, low quality:1.3), (depth of field, blurry:1.2), (greyscale, monochrome:1.1), 3D face, nose, cropped, lowres, text, jpeg artifacts, signature, watermark, username, blurry, artist name, trademark, watermark, title, multiple view, Reference sheet,
